#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install pipetest
```

#### Scripts usage
command|`usage`
-|-
`pipetest` |`usage: pipetest operator value`

#### Examples
```bash
$ echo 42 | pipetest -gt 40 && echo gt
gt
```
